attributes.action: Restrict the use of cars on the 1st sunday of each month during the summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many bikers enjoy a nice ride on a sunny day, wouldn't it be safer if there were less cars on the road so that bikers dont have to worry about cars pulling out in front of them, driving into the back of them at junctions. I propose that cars should be band from road on the 1st sunday of each month during the summer so that there is a day that bikers can ride in with more safety.
